# Pox Pustules (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Druid Spells|Druid 2]], [[2nd Level Witch Spells|Witch 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 4]], [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (leaves from a toxic plant)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One creature

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Advanced Player's Guide, pg. 236

You inflict a painful, itching rash on the target creature. The target is [[Sickened|sickened]] and takes a â€“4 penalty to Dexterity (this penalty cannot lower Dexterity below 0). The target can spend a move action scratching furiously at the rash to remove the [[Sickened|sickened]] condition (but not the Dexterity penalty) until the start of its next turn.
